1. Select the Network to fund your walle: 1. Select the Network to fund your wallet from
2. Select the Networks you want to fund: 2. Select the Networks you want to fund your wallet on
Funding a wallet on a chain you never us: Funding a wallet on a chain you never used before can be tricky. With GasHopper you can fund your EVM Wallet on all supported chains with only one transaction. GasHopper was designed to make onboarding to new chains easy.
GasHopper can only send funds from it's: GasHopper can only send funds from it's own wallet. If a wallet on a specific chain is empty or too low, the dApp prevents the exchange from happening.
GasHopper charges a 10% fee on every exc: GasHopper charges a 10% fee on every exchange. This fee goes into the GasHopper funding wallet and ultimately into Varen DAO Treasury as protocol owned liquidity.
GasHopper is a Multi-Chain-Faucet. It op: GasHopper is a Multi-Chain-Faucet. It operates as a 'smart wallet' that has a middleware connected to it, which is listening to incoming transactions on the wallet.
GasHopper uses the varen.eth ENS Domain.
I can't agree on a rate, as the funding: I can't agree on a rate, as the funding wallet balance is too low?
I got an error using GasHopper. Where do: I got an error using GasHopper. Where do I find help?
I sent funds after rate expired. Are my: I sent funds after rate expired. Are my funds lost?
Make sure, you send the exact amount of: Make sure, you send the exact amount of funds (listed in the accepted rate). The middleware will pick up your transaction and execute the exchange.
My accepted rate says 'Pending...' but t: My accepted rate says 'Pending...' but there is no send button to be found. Do I have to start over?
Navigate to the Varen Discord server and: Navigate to the Varen Discord server and provide your wallet address in the Discords #support channel.
No, your funds can not get lost on GasHo: No, your funds can not get lost on GasHopper, as the middleware is in full control of the wallet. If a rate did not get fullfilled by the middleware, it can be initiated manually by the Varen DAO.
Please switch to one of the networks lis: Please switch to one of the networks listed below.
The wallet address of the GasHopper fund: The wallet address of the GasHopper funding wallet is: {FAUCET_ADDRESS}
To avoid any exploit capabilities of the: To avoid any exploit capabilities of the dApp, you have to accept a rate of exchange, based on the current TWAP prices of the individual native tokens of the exchange process. After you accepted your rate, the middleware is looking for your deposit to the 'smart wallet' of GasHopper.
Waiting for the transactions to be compl: Waiting for the transactions to be completed
Where can I check the balances of the Ga: Where can I check the balances of the GasHopper wallet?
Why is there a 'Varen DAO Treasury' elem: Why is there a 'Varen DAO Treasury' element in my rate?
You are connected with an unsupported ne: You are connected with an unsupported network.
You can check the Balances of it: You can check the Balances of it
You can either wait for the balance to b: You can either wait for the balance to be replenished by other exchanges, or navigate to the Varen DAO Discord server and inform the DAO via the #support channel.
You could start over, or just send the f: You could start over, or just send the funds of the selected source manually.
Your rate is valid for a period of 60 mi: Your rate is valid for a period of 60 minutes. If you do not send any funds in that timeframe, the rate will expire and won't be served by the middleware anymore.
